text: Bhutanitis thaidina, commonly known as the Chinese three-tailed swallowtail, is a rare species of butterfly in the family Papilionidae. The butterfly is found in Tibet and China. The larva feeds on Aristolochia Aristolochia moupinensis. ==Subspecies== * B. t. thaidina * B. t. dongchuaensis ==References== * ==External links== * * *TOLweb.org: Taxonomic discussion of Bhutanitis thaidina T Category:Butterflies of China Category:Fauna of Tibet Category:Taxa named by Émile Blanchard Category:Butterflies described in 1871
title: Bhutanitis thaidina
